mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '') id, SUM(a.sales_count) sales_count, SUM(a.sales_amount) sales_amount, a.order_day FROM report_by_device a WHERE a.order_day=#{orderDay} GROUP BY a.order_day
mapper.insert:
